author: Dennilight
post_text: April 15, 2015 at 8:25 AM#1Hi,I need a macro to auto-create mixcolor presets for Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta, Yellow and White. I want to use this to auto-create a kind of "test-pattern", running during the "construction-phase" without spending time to build it new every time i have different fixtures.---update: I think I found a way to do that, thanks.

posts.post_text: May 13, 2015 at 8:54 PM#3Try "Colour create and Label" and here is another one that saves time for me "Color Sequence"FilesColour Create and Label.xml28.52 kB – 135 DownloadsCreate Color Sequence.xml6.4 kB – 119 Downloads
